story_title: Over 6 Million Bones Under Paris: Secrets Revealed
original_story: [mysterious] Beneath Paris, a shocking underworld awaits: the Catacombs, housing over six million souls. Built in the late 18th century, these tunnels were created to solve the city's grave crisis, as overflowing cemeteries spread disease. In 1810, workers transported bones from the Saints-Innocents cemetery, stacking them in eerie displays. Today, 200 miles of tunnels twist below, many unexplored. Imagine wandering through tunnels where darkness reigns, yet whispers of history echo. What secrets still lie hidden in this bone-chilling burial ground?
